75d5004d89f0.title: Jesus was killed because he was upsetting the status quo.

paragraphs.name: efac
paragraphs.text: Jesus was killed because he was upsetting the status quo. His people’s leaders feared his growing power and influence and so attempted to silence him. He chose a path consistent with his message, his values, he did not resist, exhorted is followers to follow his example and continue his work. Martyred he became a movement and was deified. The message still resonates today.
